desc: 공격력 50% 상승&확률로 상대 방어를 무시하고 데미지를 준다

dictionary.lore: Though everyone knew this sword's name, none knew anyone who fought with it. Even though its great power is spoken of in legends across the world, nowhere can its name be found in documents. Regardless, people believe in its existence and continue to pass its legend down, saying "There is nothing the Ragna Blade can't split in two, not even a god!"

name: 신패검 라그나네이드
